header.title: CosNotifyChannelAdmin_SequenceProxyPushSupplier

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosNotifyChannelAdmin::SequenceProxyPushSupplier interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosNotification/include/*.hrl").
This module also exports the functions described in:

func.name: connect_sequence_push_consumer(SequenceProxyPushSupplier, PushConsumer) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Connect a consumer to the proxy

desc.p: This operation connects a PushConsumer to the target object. If a connection already exists or the function psuh_structured_events is not supported the exceptions AlreadyConnected or TypeError will be raised respectively.

func.name: suspend_connection(SequenceProxyPushSupplier) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Suspend the connection between the client and the target object

desc.p: This operation suspends the connection between the client and the target object. If no connection exists or the connection is already suspended an exception is raised.

func.name: resume_connection(SequenceProxyPushSupplier) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Resume a previously suspended connection with the proxy

desc.p: If the connection have previously been suspended this operation must used if we want to resume the connection. If no object have been connected or the connection already is active an exception is raised.

func.name: disconnect_sequence_push_supplier(SequenceProxyPushSupplier) -> ok
func.fsummary: Close the connection and terminate the proxy

desc.p: This operation cause the target object to close the connection and terminate.
